title: pbe
body:
https://gyazo.com/fa0b3beb5958baed951a7e1e56d0a717
 ich dachte immer auf dem pbe hätte man unendlich viele rp und alles und das man schon lvl 30 is

replies.body:
http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/de/c/bugs/IMwVYioT-new-pbe-players-level-rp-and-ip

> Hey all!
 
> We've been seeing a lot of reports coming in from players about having 0 IP/RP, or being stuck at level 1. It can take up to 48 hours for your account to get bumped up to max level and granted IP/RP, so please be patient. If you're having this issue, please:
 
 >- Play at least one full game (it can even be coop v. ai).
> - Purchase an item from the store.
 >- Close your client and relog after these two steps.

> If your account is still stuck at level 1 and 0 IP/RP after completing these steps, please wait 48 hours for the system to apply changes to your account. After this period if you are still stuck at level 1 0 IP/RP, please respond to this thread and I'll investigate to make sure that everything is working as intended.

> Thanks Summoners
